评论详情: I do not write reviews often, but sometimes I will if my opinion differs from the average consensus. I purchased a small for 36C gals and still have some wiggle room. I think that many times women do not realize their real bust measurement before ordering an item. This is why a great many returns incur. This top has the colors as vibrant as pictured and the sizing is correct by the table  to the consumer. The top is a bit longer than I like for I am only 5'5"@105, but otherwise the fabric is that of silky nylon and great for the price. One other issue I find the consumer can not get straight is the idea of sizing up or down. Folks, sizing up means larger and sizing down means smaller than your usual size!!!!!!
The material and quality of this blouse is fabulous!  I now have this blouse in three different colors
Love the colours of this blouse. Fits true to size, and quality is good. Looks great with my navy blue jacket.

评论概述: FINALLY, A BLOUSE FOR THE CURVY!
评论详情: This blouse has an appropriate sweep (hip allowance). No need to leave the bottom buttons open. Also, the armholes  were not too large. Nice collar. Soft smooth material.

I loved the patterns, but I didn't like the fabric. It felt like tent material, and it was warm. I loved the shape of the shirt, but the fabric pulled weird, too, so even though it hit all the right spots, I felt like I needed to size up to a large even though I wear a medium usually.

评论概述: Size up if you have larger breast size
评论详情: I usually wear a small in woman's tops. I bought a medium and it fits perfectly. I'm 5'6" 132lbs. 34DD. As with all shirts from Amazon, this top needs to be steamed or ironed. I wore this with a pr of slacks and wore it tucked in. I noticed the bottom of the shirt wrinkled after I took it off. The material is thicker than I thought it would be.

I order 2 of this shirts. One black and one white. Same size But one is small that’s the other. So frustrating. I thought they sent the wrong size but both are label correctly, WHAT IS THE PROBLEM??? Ugh
I like this shirt to throw on quick to look nice. It’s very flattering. The fabric doesn’t wrinkle to much.

As a perimenopausal woman I overheat at the drop of a hat, so I was on a hunt for a layering piece that wouldn’t add too much insulation. This is perfect. Being sleeveless and lightweight minimizes overheating, the collar and slim bodice are great for layering under sweaters etc without bulk. The length of the hem allows it to be visible below the sweater if desired, but can tuck in easily. Washes well, but the wrinkles from folding/shipping require ironing/steaming out.  I bought the navy, but will be keeping an eye out for soft summer colors for future purchases.

I bought 2 of these in different colors. The shirt is as described - cotton blend so not clingy, fit is accurate, well-made. BUT - the packaging process creates strong fold creases. Washing and soaking in fabric softener did not take the lines out. I had to use a steam iron and re-iron several creases. Do not plan on wearing the blouse right out of the package.
Love the color blue. Bought XXL runs a little small but I can still fit it.
